item.title: Need help from a experinced coder
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

ok im having trouble with my sever atm everyone is enjoying but where i moved it theres no safe zones
U seen the project czar source rite? thats the source im useing but i have moved everything to
the ghost town and edited alot of stuff i am currently trying to make then ghost town a SAFE ZONE
because its mayhem
so please could some very good coder help me out and tell me what the
x---------y
y---------x
of the ghost town is because its confusing me

if ((absX >= @@@@ && absX <= @@@@ && absY >= @@@@ && absY <= @@@@

The map is “InWildy” and this is what i have

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

could u also tell me where to add the safe zone i would be very very very greatfull as its confuseing me
Thanks.

Read full topic
